• Digital Director

    Indiana Daily Student

     July 2015 - December 2015

    Manage and produce content for the Indiana Daily Student's digital department. Oversee the transition of the digital department from two desk editors to its four person team. Organize editors to research and design media for daily online publication. Develop original interactive graphics and research topics for long form stories. Report on Google Analytics and twitter trends to the newsroom and use this information to create social media strategies. Work with a contracted CMS provider to deal with bugs and request new features.

  • Basketball Beat Photographer

      November 2015 - Present

    Took photographs of IU Basketball for the Indiana Daily Student.

  • Counselor

    High School Journalism Institute

     July 2015

    Watch students attending Indiana University's High School Journalism Institute while not in class. Answer questions about IU's Media School. Taught introductory photoshop and illustrator sessions. Work with students on their current journalism projects.

  • Layout Designer

    Society for News Design

     May 2015 - June 2015

    Worked under Steve Layton to layout the features section for the 36th Annual Best of News Design book.

  • Digital Editor

      January 2015 - May 2015

    Produce and manage digital content for the Indiana Daily Student. Create interactive graphics, gather and organize research, film daily videos, coordinate multimedia projects with section editors, create social media targeted content, and design custom sites for long form stories.

  • Front End Developer

    Indiana Univesity Student Television

     September 2014 - December 2014

    Setup a new domain, installed wordpress and migrated content from the previous site. Trained the staff on how to post new content and to alter the theme's options.

  • Photographer

    Indiana Daily Student

      January 2014 - Present

    Acts as a freelance photographer for daily pitches. Primarily takes photos of sports and theatrical events. Work with section editors on in-depth projects for photo illustrations and portraits. Filled in as photo editor during end of Summer 2015 production due to a family emergency of the original editor.

  • Bachelor of Arts

    Indiana University

     August 2013 - Present

    I'm halfway through earning a degree in Journalism with specializations in Graphics, Design and Photojournalism as well as a certificate from the School of Informatics.
